00020 /*
00021  * TimeValue.h
00022  *
00023  *  Created on: Sep 19, 2008
00024  *      Author: aclarke
00025  */
00026 
00027 #ifndef TIMEVALUE_H_
00028 #define TIMEVALUE_H_
00029 
00030 #include <climits>
00031 #include <com/xuggle/xuggler/ITimeValue.h>
00032 
00033 namespace com { namespace xuggle { namespace xuggler {
00034 
00035 class TimeValue: public ITimeValue
00036 {
00037   VS_JNIUTILS_REFCOUNTED_OBJECT_PRIVATE_MAKE(TimeValue);
00038 public:
00039   virtual int64_t get(Unit unit);
00040   virtual int32_t compareTo(ITimeValue* other);
00041 
00042   Unit getNativeUnit();
00043 
00044   static TimeValue* make(int64_t value, Unit unit);
00045   static TimeValue* make(TimeValue *src);
00046   static inline int32_t compare(int64_t thisValue, int64_t thatValue)
00047   {
00048     int64_t retval;
00049     int64_t adjustment = 1;
00050     const static int64_t sMaxDistance = LLONG_MAX/2;
00051     if ((thisValue > sMaxDistance && thatValue <= -sMaxDistance) ||
00052         (thatValue > sMaxDistance && thisValue <= -sMaxDistance))
00053       // in these  cases we assume the time value has looped over
00054       // a int64_t value, and we really want to invert the diff.
00055       adjustment = -1;
00056 
00057     if (thisValue < thatValue)
00058       retval = -adjustment;
00059     else if (thisValue > thatValue)
00060       retval = adjustment;
00061     else
00062       retval = 0;
00063     return retval;
00064   }
00065 
00066 protected:
00067   TimeValue();
00068   virtual ~TimeValue();
00069 private:
00070   void set(int64_t value, Unit unit);
00071   int64_t mValue;
00072   Unit mUnit;
00073 };
00074 
00075 }}}
00076 
00077 #endif /* TIMEVALUE_H_ */
